attributes.action: Make paedophile hunters a recognized law enforcement service
attributes.background: We are a team of paedophile Hunters Across Britain who are attempting to help the police with their enquiries but we are not always met with the best response it would be better and more beneficial for the country if we were our own recognise law enforcement

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
